duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement process re-engineering, develop business requirements, use cases, and test scripts using industry accepted practices.
Conduct business process analyses and needs assessments to align information technology solutions with the business initiatives.
Support analytical functions by assisting programmers in ascertaining user needs and adapting user procedures to final program design.
Organize and facilitate application testing and user acceptance to ensure business community’s needs are met.
Act as second and third level support for Production incidents and facilitate troubleshooting and close out of reported issues for multiple applications.
Utilize current organization-wide and/or department-specific software to complete assignments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Computer Science, or related field (Master’s preferred)
